DOC.brief_title: VA HDL Intervention Trial ( VA-HIT ) Ancillary Study Data Analysis
DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : The VA HDL Intervention trial ( VA-HIT ) multicenter , placebo control , randomize trial show gemfibrozil significantly reduce major cardiovascular event 2531 men coronary heart disease , low level low density lipoprotein ( LDL ) cholesterol low level high density lipoprotein ( HDL ) cholesterol . In addition unique lipid profile , VA-HIT population also high prevalence diabetes , impair fast glucose , high fast plasma insulin ; central obesity ; hypertension , component ( together high triglyceride low HDL-cholesterol ) constellation risk factor know metabolic syndrome . Since prior clinical trial enrol type population , VA- HIT database unique resource . DESIGN NARRATIVE : The study use VA-HIT database study additional risk marker measure study population 2,531 men coronary heart disease . Specific analysis : 1 ) association level glucose tolerance , insulin resistance feature metabolic syndrome , occurrence major cardiovascular outcome , gemfibrozil efficacy ; 2 ) effect gemfibrozil progression carotid atherosclerosis , measure B-mode ultrasound ; 3 ) association LDL particle size distribution lipoprotein subclass distribution ; homocysteine ; lipoprotein ( ) ; C-reactive protein , tissue plasminogen activator ; fibrinogen ; factor VII ; major cardiovascular outcome gemfibrozil efficacy .
